name: Kraft Balsamic Vinaigrette Salad Dressing (16 fl oz Bottle)
short_description: One 16 fl oz bottle of Kraft Balsamic Vinaigrette
Kraft Balsamic Vinaigrette is made with quality ingredients
Balsamic vinaigrette has a bold, sweet flavor
Easy to pour vinaigrette is ready to enjoy after a quick shake
Contains no high-fructose corn syrup, no artificial dyes and 70 calories per serving
Light textured balsamic vinaigrette works well as a marinade
Convenient squeeze bottle makes it easier to dispense the right amount to your favorite dish
product_description: Kraft Balsamic Vinaigrette adds bold, zesty flavor to almost anything. Bursting with balsamic vinegar, Dijon mustard, and herbs and spices, our family favorite balsamic vinaigrette delivers mouthwatering flavor in every bite. Pre-mixed for convenience, our bottled vinaigrette is ready to enjoy after a quick shake. With no high-fructose corn syrup, no artificial dyes and 70 calories per serving, you'll feel good about adding our delicious vinaigrette to all your favorite appetizers and entrees. Try it on a salad or sandwich, or use it as a delicious chicken marinade. Our balsamic vinaigrette is packaged in a squeezable 16 fluid ounce bottle for easy storage.

name: 365 by Whole Foods Market, Organic Balsamic Vinaigrette, 16 Fl Oz
short_description: Organic balsamic vinaigrette with classic tangy-sweet flavor
Perfect for salads, marinades, and sandwich drizzles
Versatile dressing ideal for vegetables and protein dishes

product_description: Who are we? Well, we seek out the finest natural and organic foods available, maintain the strictest quality standards in the industry, and have an unshakeable commitment to sustainable agriculture. We ban 300+ ingredients from all food that we sell, including hydrogenated fats, high-fructose corn syrup and sweeteners such as aspartame, sucralose and saccharin, so you can skip deciphering ingredient labels and cut to relishing your finds. Our 365 by Whole Foods Market brand offers over 2,500 affordably priced and thoughtfully sourced products that not only meet our already strict standards, but also in many cases go above and beyond what we require of other brands.

name: Walden Farms Honey Balsamic Vinaigrette – Calorie-Free, Low Carb, Keto-Friendly, Vegan, Sugar-Free Dressing with Sweet Honey & Tangy Balsamic – 12 oz Bottle
short_description: SWEET HONEY & TANGY BALSAMIC, ZERO GUILT – Relish the smooth sweetness of golden honey perfectly balanced with bold balsamic tang. All the flavor you love, with none of the calories, sugar, or carbs you don’t.
PERFECT FOR SALADS & BEYOND – Drizzle over crisp greens, quinoa bowls, or roasted vegetables. Try as a marinade for chicken, salmon, or tofu to add gourmet flair to your weeknight meals.
ZERO CALORIES, SUGAR & FAT – Made for keto, diabetic, low-carb, and calorie-conscious lifestyles, so you can enjoy this sweet and tangy dressing without compromising your goals.
DIET-FRIENDLY & ALLERGEN-FREE – 100% vegan, gluten-free, dairy-free, and fat-free, making it a versatile choice for homes with mixed dietary needs and preferences.
TRUSTED FLAVOR SINCE 1972 – For over 50 years, Walden Farms has perfected the art of crafting flavorful, better-for-you dressings that bring bold taste to healthy eating.

name: M.G. PAPPAS Balsamic Vinegar from Italy - Gourmet Balsamic Italian Vinegar - A Great Addition to Vinaigrettes, Salads & Dressings - No Preservatives, No Added Sugar, No Additives - 8.5 Fl Oz (250ml)
short_description: 【Authentic Balsamic Vinegar Made In Italy】100% of our grapes are sourced directly from Italy, allowing us to offer you a rich and authentic premium quality Italian balsamic vinegar that is unmatched. Experience its syrupy consistency with a sweet yet slightly pungent taste.

【Premium Balsamic Vinegar】We believe the best balsamic vinegars are produced in a barrel. This method allows for a mature, brilliant, and a deep brown-colored finished product that only contains 6% acidity.

【Rich Flavor】Our Traditional style balsamic vinegar is gourmet quality, with a well-balanced flavor profile it is sweet, low in acidity, provides a fragrant aroma, and the finish is thick yet smooth syrup-like consistency.

【No Artificial Ingredients】The secret to our great taste is simplicity; this balsamic vinegar has two ingredients: cooked grape must and wine vinegar, which means there are no thickening agents, no caramel, no added sugar, no added flavors, no artificial additives, no colorants, and no preservatives.

【Delicious Pairings】Pair with our unique signature olive oils for a flavorful, aromatic vinaigrette or make a great-tasting balsamic vinegar dressing to enjoy with salads, fish, cheese, bread, and so much more!

name: Greek Balsamic Vinegar & Glaze - 2x 8.45oz | Balsamic Vinaigrette Dressing, Balsamic Glaze Drizzle, Salad Dressing | Vegan, Organic-Style, Gluten-Free Greek Dressing - 500ml
short_description: BALSAMIC VINEGAR & GLAZE - GREEK-MADE: Enjoy thick, sweet Greek balsamic vinegar and balsamic glaze crafted for drizzling on meats, veggies, or salads. A rich balsamic glaze drizzle perfect for elevated cooking. Our healthy salad dressings are made with 100% fruit juices, containing at least 28% natural fruit juice for a richer flavor.

ORGANIC-STYLE SALAD DRESSING OPTION: This vegan, gluten-free dressing serves as a healthier alternative to creamy or processed options - a clean-label organic salad dressing taste, made with real fruit extracts. They are suitable for vegetarians and vegans, catering to diverse dietary needs.

MULTI-USE BALSAMIC VINAIGRETTE DRESSING: Ideal as a salad dressing, marinade, or glaze - this balsamic vinaigrette dressing offers versatility for everyday meals or gourmet dishes. A flavorful vinaigrette dressing loved by foodies. We balance the sweet and sour taste with a rich, creamy texture of our dressings, making them versatile for various culinary uses.

MADE IN GREECE: Our dressings are proudly produced in Greece using traditional methods and high-quality local ingredients. These dressings enhance the taste of various dishes with its rich, creamy texture and sweet-sour flavor.

GREEK DRESSING YOU CAN TRUST: Handmade in Greece using traditional methods, our balsamic vinegar and vinaigrette dressing range is ideal for those who value authentic, preservative-free Mediterranean dressings.
